dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.memento

Class DefaultMementoFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.memento.AbstractMementoFactory
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.memento.DefaultMementoFactory

  • public class DefaultMementoFactory
extends AbstractMementoFactory
    This is the default implementation of a AbstractMementoFactory. The default implementation returns instances of Memento that do not have been specifically initialized.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b
